sentences.en: An eyelash 1 curler is a girl's best friend.
sentences.cn: 睫毛夹是女孩子的大爱.

sentences.en: Do you need on artificial eyelash? I think it will be better.
sentences.cn: 你需要贴假睫毛 吗 ?我认为贴上假眼毛比较好看.
你需要贴假睫毛 吗 ?

sentences.en: Down eyelash: brush the eyelash at Z - shaped line with vertical brush.
sentences.cn: 下睫毛: 将睫毛刷竖起,用刷头以Z字型左右来回刷拭.

sentences.en: French eyelash accentuates this comfortable bra with is also very versatile with your wardrobe.
sentences.cn: 法国睫毛蕾丝加剧了这舒适的胸罩,这也是非常灵活的与您的衣柜里的衣服搭配.

sentences.en: He would have tricked her without turning an eyelash.
sentences.cn: 他会不动声色地把她骗了,连眼皮也不眨一下.

sentences.en: How about wearing fake eyelashes instead of using an eyelash curler?
sentences.cn: 不用睫毛夹,试试假睫毛如何?
我使用的是资生堂睫毛夹.

sentences.en: Longtime readers of the Beauty Brains are familiar with all that we have written about eyelash growth products.
sentences.cn: 美丽头脑的老读者都已经非常熟悉我们所写的，有关于睫毛增长产品的文章了。

sentences.en: Sometimes I will be lonely, because of him long eyelash fail to see.
sentences.cn: 有时候我会寂寞, 因为看不到他长长的睫毛.

sentences.en: The mini size head can curl eyelash totally freely, the corner, the up & down eyelashes.
sentences.cn: 眼角 、 上下 眼睑等周围的细小睫毛也能轻松卷翘.

sentences.en: Then we found a study that showed there was a material that seemed to have stimulated eyelash growth.
sentences.cn: 随后我们找到了一项研究，研究表明的确有一种物质可以刺激睫毛增长。

sentences.en: Use an eyelash curler to curl lashes first - this will open the eye and groom the lashes.
sentences.cn: 用睫毛刷卷起睫毛,然后刷上睫毛膏.

sentences.en: What makes you think the owner of the eyelash is here?
sentences.cn: 你根据什么认为眼睫毛主人在这里?

trans.tran_en: one of the small hairs that grow along the edge of your eyelids
